metadata.name: The Future Is Now
metadata.description: The Future is Now! " is a groundbreaking collection that showcases AI's power in music and art. With AI technology rapidly advancing, this collection represents the cutting edge of a new era in creativity. Featuring AI-generated music and generative art, this collection represents a fusion of technology and art, showcasing the limitless potential of AI in creative endeavours. each item in the collection demonstrates the incredible range and diversity of AI. The generative art included in the collection is equally impressive, with each piece created through a unique algorithm that produces art that is both intricate and captivating. These pieces (Tracks and Artwork) represent the intersection of Music, Technology and art, and their unique aesthetic is a testament to the creative potential of AI.
